questions.question: 1. What is incorrect about Kruskal’s algorithm?

answers.a: Edges in MST cannot form cycles
answers.c: It makes use of disjoint set data structure
answers.d: MST is constructed from decreasing weighted edges

explanations.d: Minimum spanning tree consists of edges having minimum possible weight. Hence MST is constructed from increasing weighted edges.

questions.question: 2. In a graph having V vertices and E edges, what is the smallest possible edge count of a Minimum Spanning Tree?

explanations.c: In a tree of V nodes, V-1 edges are present. Same is applicable for Minimum Spanning Tree.

questions.question: 3. How do we detect whether one edge(with V1 and V2 as vertices on both the ends) is a part of a cycle in the graph?

answers.a: V1 and V2 belong to different set in union-find
answers.b: V1 has smaller value than V2
answers.c: V1 and V2 belong to same set in union-find
answers.d: V1 has larger value than V2

explanations.a: If V1 and V2 belong to different set, then edge is not a part of the cycle
explanations.b: Value of V1 and V2 doesn’t matter when finding a cycle
explanations.c: Yes, if V1 and V2 belong to same set, then edge is a part of the cycle and hence will not be considered while building a MST
explanations.d: Value of V1 and V2 doesn’t matter when finding a cycle

questions.question: 4. Which edge gets judged if it should or shouldn't be in MST after n iterations?

explanations.a: As it is the first edge present in the sorted array of edges, hence it should be a part of MST
explanations.b: Largest edge may or may not be in MST
explanations.c: Middlemost edge may or may not be in MST

questions.question: 5. When do we add an edge to MST while running Kruskal's ?

answers.a: When edge forms a cycle in MST
answers.b: When edge doesn’t forms a cycle in MST
answers.c: When edge is the next smallest possible edge irrespective of the cycle

explanations.a: If edge forms a cycle, then it violates the property of the tree
explanations.b: If edge is smallest and doesn’t forms a cycle, then it is a part of the MST
explanations.c: Even though the edge is the next smallest possible edge, it may not be added if it forms a cycle
